articles.description: Team GB maintain their 100% record in the Winter Olympics mixed doubles with victory over Sweden.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Snoop Dogg takes centre stage but GB curlers shine again

articles.description: Great Britain's Julian Cash and Lloyd Glasspool face Poland's Viktor Durasovic and Lukas Hellum-Lilleenge in Davis Cup qualifying, knowing victory will wrap up the tie - follow live.
articles.title: Davis Cup LIVE: Norway v Great Britain - TV coverage & text commentary

articles.description: James Milner will equal the Premier League appearance record if he features for Brighton on Sunday, 24 years after making his debut as a 16-year-old.
articles.title: James Milner: From £70-a-week YTS player to brink of Premier League appearance record

articles.description: India teenager Vaibhav Suryavanshi makes a stunning 175 from just 80 balls in the Under-19 World Cup final against England.
articles.title: Vaibhav Suryavanshi: India teenager, 14, makes 175 from 80 balls in Under-19 World Cup final against England

articles.description: Pep Guardiola defended his stance of speaking up about global conflicts by asking, "why should I not express what I feel, just because I am a manager?"
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City boss asks 'why should I not express how I feel?'

articles.description: Former players turned pundits have a "duty of responsibility" to the new generation of footballers when commenting on their performances, Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk says.
articles.title: Virgil van Dijk says pundits have 'duty of responsibility' to current players

articles.description: We look at the key players and key battles that will decide whether the Seattle Seahawks or New England Patriots will win Super Bowl 60 in Santa Clara.
articles.title: Super Bowl 60: Where Seattle Seahawks vs New England Patriots will be won and lost

articles.description: BBC Sport crunches the numbers to see if greater ambition in attack can secure England a Six Nations title.
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: Can England's evolving attack bring them title?

articles.description: All the latest from Friday's Premier League news conferences as Pep Guardiola, Mikel Arteta, David Moyes and others speak before the weekend's matches.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: News conferences and team news before the weekend

articles.description: Former Aston Villa striker Jhon Duran is set to join the sixth club of his career at the age of just 22.
articles.title: Jhon Duran: Ex-Aston Villa striker set for sixth club aged just 22
